Why BTR

The Honest Broker for Sovereign AI

In a crowded landscape of AI consultancies and national initiatives, BTR occupies a unique position: independent counsel at the intersection of national interests and the technological frontier.

True Independence

Not beholden to any single vendor. BTR provides objective analysis of sovereignty trade-offs and confidential advisory that's separate from implementation. We don't sell cloud services or modelsâ€”we provide strategic counsel.

Unparalleled Network Effects

Active relationships with all major AI labsâ€”OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Cloud, AWS, NVIDIA. Combined with intelligence community credibility and understanding of both policy and engineering constraints, BTR can coordinate across the entire ecosystem.

20+ Year Track Record

From cryptocurrency and blockchain to cloud computing and now Sovereign AI, two decades of translating emerging technology into policy and organizational change. Proven ability to navigate the gap between technical possibility and strategic reality.

Intelligence Community Credibility

Long-standing relationships with U.S. intelligence agencies including CIA, FBI, and ODNI provide unique insight into security-first AI deployment, enabling frameworks that balance capability with protection.

Technical-Policy Bridge

Understanding both sides of the divide: what technology can actually deliver and what governance requires. Strategy that implementation teams can execute, not theoretical frameworks that collapse on contact with reality.

Global Perspective, Local Understanding

Experience across multiple continents with governments, enterprises, and institutions. Understanding that sovereignty means different things in different contextsâ€”and designing frameworks accordingly.

"The decisions nations make in 2025-2026 will determine their AI sovereignty for decades. BTR exists to ensure those decisions are informed by independent expertise, not vendor interests."

The Iceland Advantage

Neutral Ground for Sovereign AI

Iceland's unique positionâ€”geographically, politically, and technologicallyâ€”makes it an ideal base for independent Sovereign AI counsel.

Neutral Jurisdiction

A stable democracy with no geopolitical agenda in AI dominance. Iceland provides a genuinely neutral perspective on technology sovereigntyâ€”advising in the interest of nations, not competing powers.

Privacy-First Culture

Iceland has consistently championed digital rights and data protection. From the Modern Media Initiative to strong GDPR implementation, it understands what data sovereignty means in practice.

Sustainable Infrastructure

100% renewable energy and cool climate make Iceland a global leader in sustainable data center operations. AI infrastructure here operates with minimal environmental impact.

Digital Innovation Leader

One of the world's most digitally advanced societies. Iceland has pioneered digital government services, creating a testbed for AI applications in public services.

North Atlantic Bridge

Positioned between North America and Europe, Iceland serves as a natural bridge for international collaboration. Time zone overlap with both continents facilitates global coordination.

Nordic/EU Alignment

Strong ties to Nordic AI sovereignty initiatives and European regulatory frameworks. Understanding of EU AI Act implications and GDPR requirements built into every engagement.

Board Advisor: Iceland Modern Media Initiative

Josh Klein serves as a board advisor to Iceland's groundbreaking Modern Media Initiative (MMI), which established Iceland as a haven for digital freedom and transparency. This role reflects deep integration with Iceland's digital policy community.

Ecosystem

Working With the Leading AI Ecosystem

BTR maintains active NDAs, MOUs, and standing working sessions with the world's leading AI providers, ensuring nations have access to cutting-edge capabilities while preserving sovereignty.
